Articles.Content:
Hey, I'm having an issue with #autoLOC_ messages appearing where I assume text is intended to be, in both the axis group menu and some part menus. I'm told it's something to do with localisation, but I'm not sure if everyone's having this specific issue?

Running KSP 1.7.1 in English, with 1.7.1 Making History, and 1.0.0 Breaking Ground. I've tried redownloading/installing Breaking Ground,  as I assume its related to that, and removing mods (Restock), but the issue is still persisting.
Is this on Steam? We have seen similar issues with bad downloads. Have you tried verifying your steam files? Or restarting Steam after updating the game?

53 minutes ago, nestor said:

Is this on Steam? We have seen similar issues with bad downloads. Have you tried verifying your steam files? Or restarting Steam after updating the game?

Not on Steam, been downloading through the KSP Store.

...buuuut, seeing this post reminded me that A) Axis groups are part of the main 1.7.1 update, and B) I actually used the 1.7.0 to 1.7.1 patch, which historically has always been a bit iffy. So I did a clean install of the main game, and problem solved!

Thanks!

@nestor i have also have a similar problem on steam but nothing has fixed it, i have tried verifying my files and completely uninstalling and re-installing KSP.

the autoLOC-xxxxxxxx doesn't appear in my ""\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\Localization\dictionary.cfg"" file

i have commented on Bug #22685. 

this is running 1.7.1 and I don't have any of the DLC. i don't have the problem on 1.7.0

sorry i haven't worked out how to attach a picture in a post yet!

https://imgur.com/a/awIbRrh

Edited June 1, 2019 by Faltease
